title: Save our SGT.
body:
Proposal to block any attempt/s to fork or mint a new version of SGT or variant, Until such a time that ALL vETH2 has been secured and an appropriate method is found/coded to unlock the staked ETH, via the recieved vETH2 tokens (for many still locked up in SGT-vETH2 pair) or similar, and ensure the return of ETH to all staking participants.

The core premise, is that if a new SGT /variant is minted/forked, it creates unneccessary complications and potential unforeseen limitations, prior to the securing, and redistributing of valuable ETH to all those whom staked/pool via the various sharedstake / saddle mechanisms.

So choose to 
1. Save SGT (no re-minting/fork until all ETH is released and returned.
or 
2. Screw SGT, mint or fork away until your hearts content, and hope the LPers have short term memory loss, or worse.
choices: Destroy SGT and screw the LPers
author: 0xbddDc071a8F11e178F0b7eF462C6667d8D7fd3E4
